mapper.select: SELECT directory.directoryId,directory.parentDirectoryId, directory.ownerId,directory.name,directory.absolutePath, directory.isGroupDirectory FROM directory WHERE (directory.absolutePath LIKE #{path} AND directory.ownerId = #{ownerId} AND directory.isGroupDirectory = #{isGroup});

SELECT directory.name,directory.directoryId, directory.parentDirectoryId,directory.isGroupDirectory, directory.absolutePath FROM directory where directory.parentDirectoryId = (select directory.directoryId from directory where (directory.absolutePath = #{parentDirectory} AND directory.ownerId = #{ownerId} AND directory.isGroupDirectory = #{isGroup}));

SELECT directory.name,directory.directoryId, directory.parentDirectoryId,directory.isGroupDirectory, directory.absolutePath FROM directory where directory.directoryId IN
#{id}
